job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout GameChangerstrongppWe believe sports are important because they encourage leadership teamwork responsibility and confidencecritical life lessons that have the power to propel our youthnbsptoward meaningful futures We recognize that without coaches parents and volunteers organized youth sports could not exist We celebrate those dedicated heroes and make it our mission to help them do what they do bestppbrppGameChanger provides teams across the country with team management and scorekeeping capabilities as well as live fan experiences that keep parents family and friends engagednbspas games are announced animated and video streamed in realtime With GameChanger coaches and parents are able to organize and follow their athletes journey in a simple and powerful wayppbrppBased in downtown Manhattan GameChanger is a cuttingedge technology company and a proud member of the DICKS Sporting Goods familyppbrppstrongThe PositionstrongppAs a Senior Data Engineer you will work together in a crossdisciplinary team of Data Scientists Production Engineers and Data Engineers to evolve our data pipeline warehouse and workflow systems to be more resilient extensible and maintainablenbspYou will also design and extend data models for a normalized data warehouse with terabytes of data to be turned into sports and customer insights Our solutions benefit everyone including Product Managers Developers Data Scientists Marketing Executives Coaches Players and ParentsppbrppstrongWhat Youll DostrongpulliPartner with the analytics team to provide the data and tools they need to solve complex problemsliliCollaborate across the engineering organization to develop relational database designs and queriesliliWork with product teams to get feature data emitted into the data pipeline and engage with them to leverage insights to inform their roadmapliliIdentify improvements in the flow of our dataliliEvaluate new technologies both selfmanaged and services for moving transforming modeling and storing data and make recommendationsliliImprove ETL efficiencyliliWork with Engineers in other parts of DICKS Sporting Goods to design data flows across businessesliulpbrppstrongWho You Arestrongpulli3 years of software development experience preferably as a data or backend engineerliliExperienced with Scala Python or TypescriptnbspliliFamiliar with Apache Kafka or other streaming technologiesnbspliliComfortable working across multiple languages databases paradigms etcliliEager to learn about a range of technologies Our teams use a variety of languages databases and technologies to accomplish their objectives so were always learning and sharingliulpstrongPerksstrongpulliWork remotely or from our wellfurnished modern office in NYCs FiDililiUnlimited vacation policyliliTechnology stipend  3500 every 2 years to purchase new technologyliliFull health benefits  medical dental vision prescription FSAHRA etc as well as coverage for familydependentsliliLife insurance  basic life supplemental life and dependent lifeliliDisability leave  shortterm disability and longterm disabilityliliRetirement savings  401K plan offered through VanguardliliGenerous maternitypaternity leaveliliCommuter benefitsliliDICKS Sporting Goods Teammate DiscountliulpbrppWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusp
